thread.title: Chelsea wing-back Victor Moses signs contract extension to tie him to Stamford Bridge until 2021
thread.title_full: Chelsea wing-back Victor Moses signs contract extension to tie him to Stamford Bridge until 2021

author: Adrian Kajumba
title: Chelsea wing-back Victor Moses signs contract extension to tie him to Stamford Bridge until 2021
text:
Victor Moses has signed a new deal (Photo: Richard Heathcote) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chelsea wing-back Victor Moses has signed a two-year contract extension. 
The Nigerian, 26, is now tied to the Blues until 2021. 
He said: "I feel very excited. I’m delighted to be here for another few years now and to sign a new deal. 
"Now it’s time to concentrate on the team and keep working hard to make sure we win games and try to win the Premier League this season. 
"We’re having a great season, I’m enjoying my football and we have a good manager here that has given every single one of us confidence. I just want to keep on enjoying it and working hard for the team." 
More to follow.
